name: Callisto
description: I believe that life is a work in progress. There are so many things in life to enjoy and share. Quiet time is as important to me as learning and experiencing new things. Cuddling in front of a movie, listening to music or sitting on the shore of an ocean watching the waves crash with someone I care for is about as healing as it gets. Just sitting quietly and listening without the feeling that we have to keep up a conversation …it is a very comforting feeling. I tend to be self-reliant and do not enjoy depending solely on others. I try to be objective in decision making and not let emotions bias my decisions. I am open and honest in my communication and do not like to leave issues to smolder. I would rather bring problems into the open to discuss and resolve.
